summary:
A creative, pragmatic and hardworking allround urban professional focused on growing in the field of strategic project & crisis management. Coordinated and has lead different projects in the field of; social services , building and planning, safety and sport & healthcare department. 
Matthew can also be hired as an chairman or discussion leader for various business meetings and incentives. 

Strong project management skills with a passion to lead complex programs and projects. 
Specialties: Organization, politics, networking, selling, writing, leadership, event management and stage performance skills.

Insights discovery model : Orange (Motivator) 
Belbin preferance : Shaper / Plant

projects.title: Topscore Amsterdam
projects.description:
- Program coördinator, Topscore sports program.

Tospcore is an sports and lifestyle program for all young students between the age op 12 till 18 years and attending in secondary schools of Amsterdam. Students can try a variety of sports (25) within the safe enviroment of their own school afther school hours. 

The program seeks to entice young people to more weekly sports participation. In addition it tries to indice students to become a member of a sport organization in order to ensure long-term participation in sports. 

The Topscore program is active in more than 50 secondary schools in Amsterdam and has a reach of  4,000 students whom participate weekly in sports activities.Yearly around 35.000 students are active within different events and projects of the Topscore program.

projects.title: Urban Jungle Wibautstraat, Temporary use of public space
projects.description:
The project focused on creating a temporary playground and Freerunning area for children and young adolescents on the construction site of the university of applied sciences in Amsterdam.
The project was realized in direct collaboration with departments; city planning, sports department  ,multicipalacy of the city's east district and contributing partners The University of Applied Sciences of Amsterdam and Yalp playground BV.

Inhabitants from the city's east district as well as students from the university had an opportunity to experience Freerunning in a public space at the city's knowledge mile located in the Wibautstraat.

contributors.name: Hafid Ouaali (Stadsdeel Oost), Hellen Velders (Stadsdeel Oost), Michael Tijsterman (Sportservice),

projects.title: Topscore FIT (healty and fit trough sports)
projects.description:
-Project Leader-

For a part of the students in secondary schools in the age between 12 and 18 years getting active and have healthy lifestyle is a problem. Either they do not live in an environment that challenges students to get active and life healthy or there are simply not interested and have other priorities. 

The Topscore Fit program focuses on that group of students and tries to develop a product that suit the individual needs of the students that participate with in the program.
The Topscore Fit program is constructed in cooperation with the students and in laison with health and lifestyle professionals, such as PE teachers, physical therapists and nutritionists. 

Students are selected for participation on the basis of the data collected from the PE section of the school and discussions with the care coordinator and mentor.

Temporary Bridge Project 326, Central Station, Amsterdam Island.
Projectlead 
In collaboration with departments planning, north-south line underground and district office of the city center a temporary public space for sports and leisure created was created around the consturction site of the metro north south line. This space was in use during  the Amsterdam Sail event and provided inhabitans from the city centre an opportunity to recreate in a public space near the central station.

projects.title: labor legislation - Project Perspectiefbanen
projects.description:
-Reacher and policy advisor-

A "perspectief baan" (A Job  with a perspective of hire)  is a job for the unemployed from the labor market (for example due to; age, lack of education or work experience), which is subsidized by the municipality of Amsterdam for two years, in the hope that the employer hires the person afterwards.

projects.title: European Union think tank: Sustainable employability in sports
projects.description:
-Member of think tank
Think Tank seeks answers on questions such as; How can people in the sports sector remain permanently employable and sports flexible? What is needed in our industry?
Different captians of the industry joined in (Unions, Municipal sports department, employement agencies) to find an answer in cooperation with European Union labor market fund.

projects.title: Beweegplein Amsterdam 2012 and 2013
projects.description:
-Project leader -  for an gymnastics event "Beweegplein" that is annually organized in the Gymnastics Hall of Turnz in cooperation with the Royal Dutch gymnastics Union and the City of Amsterdam. 
The recreational event is organized for children with the age of 8 till 12 years old. The event has a visitor count of over 1000 children and 500 supporting parents.

projects.title: Topscore Finals
projects.description:
- Head of the project site management group-  ,Containing; 12 employees from SportService and 10 interns from the Hogeschool van Amsterdam.The group was responsible for the 10 major sportsites of the Topscore Finals event.  
The event is organized for all the 52 secondary schools of the City of Amsterdam and has a visitor count of over 3500 children.

profile_positions.description:
Overseeing intricate infrastructural projects in the city center, I serve as the team leader and chief coordinator for the Project Team, utilizing the IPM model.

Presently, as a project manager, I am spearheading several initiatives:

IBMA (Inrij Beperkende Maatregelen Amsterdam): Counter-terrorism measures at prominent public locations like Damrak, Rokin, and Amsterdam Central Station.

Pilot Weesperstraat: A pilot project where a major inner-city highway is temporarily closed to evaluate its potential transformation into a green, pedestrian and cyclist-friendly space.

Plantage Neighborhood Redevelopment: Focusing on streets near Artis Zoo, such as Plantage Parklaan and Plantage Middenlaan.

Urban Development in the City Centre: This includes projects like the establishment of a luxury 25-unit apartment complex on Nieuwe Foeliestraat.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description: The Liaison facilitates communication between the City of Amsterdam and other emergency services, including the police, fire department, and health services, during crisis situations. Acting as an advocate for local care concerns, the Liaison also provides advisory support to the (deputy) mayor of Amsterdam in times of crisis.
profile_positions.title: Crisis Liaison Officer (OVD) City of Amsterdam

profile_positions.description: Public Speakers is company that provides public speakers, meeting chairman's en discussion leaders for various types of business meetings and incentives.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: The board members discuss issues pertaining to the City of Amsterdam, either in its entirety or affecting a majority, in collaboration with the Executive Board and the City's General Manager (Gemeente Secretaris). As a board member, my responsibilities included public relations (PR), corporate communication, and hybrid working. Additionally, I led working groups for PR and communication, as well as for hybrid working, assuming a leadership role in guiding these teams.
profile_positions.title: General Board member of the Works Council (centrale ondernemingsraad )

profile_positions.description:
As the first point of contact for residents and entrepreneurs in the city center of Amsterdam, addressing a myriad of metropolitan issues with a special focus on retail diversity and local business challenges. Actively promoting new forms of cooperation between residents, entrepreneurs, and the municipality, playing a pioneering role in area-oriented working and area development. 

Stimulate engagements, to strive for a vital link between the city administration and its citizens, always emphasizing transparency and community involvement.
profile_positions.title: Gebiedsmakelaar

profile_positions.description:
Leading a dynamic team comprised of 15 sports professionals, all of whom held either Bachelor's or Master's degrees. Together we provided nuanced policy recommendations. One of our main tasks was the development and subsequent implementation of a range of social and physical projects. These projects spanned both the strategic and operational facets of the department. 

Beyond these tasks, we were continually challenged to innovate. We crafted strategic solutions that incorporated sports as a pivotal tool, not just for its conventional recreational value, but as a means to address some of the pressing urban challenges. This included using sports as an intervention to combat issues like obesity, loneliness, and even radicalization. The interconnected nature of these issues highlighted the importance of our integrated policy advice, and together we strove to make a tangible difference in our community.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager  / Team manager  , Sports and Forestry,

profile_positions.description: As a project manager, I took the lead on various projects and initiatives at a strategic level, specifically focused on the new "participation legislation". I was responsible for a project team consisting of 8 dedicated professionals. Together, we set objectives, designed strategies, and oversaw the implementation of the projects. This team brought a range of skills and expertise, which was essential for successfully addressing the complexities of the "participation legislation". Through effective leadership and collaboration, we managed to deliver tangible results that met the expectations of the stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Project manager & Policy advisor, Employment Support (Werk, Participatie en Inkomen)

profile_positions.description: In my multifaceted role, I've spearheaded over 2,000 diverse business events, from intimate gatherings of 50 to grand events with 10,000 attendees. Leading a dynamic team of 15+ across varied educational backgrounds, we've successfully managed events and ensured memorable experiences for our guests. Additionally, I've overseen operations for five PBN-owned hospitality and sports venues in Belgium and initiated improvement projects across all 15 PBN sites. Collaborating with suppliers and subcontractors, I've maintained our venues while also delving into business administration and client relations, always emphasizing value and quality. Passionate about innovation and fostering connections, I am committed to delivering excellence.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager & Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Visiting clients with the commitment to generate new orders placed at Sportive Club. 
The Sales & Marketing manager is responsible for:
• Identifying new business trends
• Approaching potential customers to translate business problems into business solutions generated by Club Sportive
• Managing the Sales consultant team 
• Giving corporate presentations 
• Responsible for the quality of the proposals to the various business prospects 
• The control of advertising pieces with the aim of generating leads for Club Sportive.
profile_positions.title: Sales and Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for supporting the gymnastics associations in policy and financial level of a district in the Netherlands.
• Substantially improve management and finance, including the introduction of system that should lead to greater professionalism.
• Responsible for developing the association's strategies for recruiting, training and development.

• Negotiation and management of funded projects within the district.
• Responsible for budgets, forecasts and currency and resource management.
profile_positions.title: District Manager / Account Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Acting as an historical tour guide at Amsterdam heritage sites such as Canal houses, Royal Palace and other historical sites in Amsterdam during the Amsterdam Heritage Days.
